summary: Ever wanted to disenchant that Dragon Priest mask? Or wanted to keep a unique item but get the enchantment?
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][center][size=6]STILL IN ALPHA[/size][/center][/u][/b]

This mod will add all the unique enchantments in form of runes in Skyrim. Since this is my first mod and I'm still new to the CK, I am releasing an Alpha to get feedback. As such all the runes I have done are in the left chest in Delphene's secret meeting room. Most or all have bugged inventory models, but all are functional.

To be clear, you disenchant them to learn the enchantments of unique items

Enchantments Available:
[list]
[*]Archmage Robes
[*]Clavicus Vile Mask
[*]Ebony Mail
[*]Hircines Ring
[*]Hevnoraak
[*]Konahrik
[*]Krosis
[*]Morokei
[*]Nahkriin
[*]Rahgot
[*]Otar
[*]Vokun
[*]Volsung
[*]Necromancer Amulet
[*]Ring of Namira
[*]Saviors Hide
[*]Shield of Ysgramor
[*]Spellbreaker
[*]Keening
[*]Mace of Molag Bal
[*]Mehrunes Razor
[*]Dawnbreaker
[*]Staff of Corruption
[*][size=2]Staff of Magnus[/size]
[/list]


Also they can be equipped as they are simply remeshed original items. I plan on changing this.

List of things to do:
[list]
[*]Enter correct descriptions
[*]Add proper models to inventory screen
[*]Make unequippable
[*]Scatter throughout Skyrim
[/list]
Based on the feedback I get here, I may add the DLC items as currently only vanilla items are done.
author: Infinity155
